ai-atk-s0101a8:49_12: for the benefit of the benefit of themselves.
ai-atk-s0101a8:49_14: And he has been appointed to do so.
ai-atk-s0101a8:49_16: They culminate in the spiritual path, perfection, fruit, and perfection.
ai-atk-s0101a8:49_18: He is in this very life-form.
ai-atk-s0101a8:49_19: And he has realized his own insight himself, and speaks with wisdom.
ai-atk-s0101a8:49_20: having practiced like this, he practiced like this: ‘This is how you crossed over to the ending of rebirth. ...
ai-atk-s0101a8:50_0: you’ll give to a conclusion, end to the opposite, and examine them.’ Then Venerable Kassapa, which one of those perfected ones did become fully extinguished.’
ai-atk-s0101a8:50_2: Those perfected ones who, perfected ones, fully awakened Buddhas have founded for their disciples.
ai-atk-s0101a8:50_3: From that day I said that what you don’t want to listen.
ai-atk-s0101a8:52_0: The Longer Discourse on the gold coins is finished.
